funny: The chicken finally crossed the road.
Bob woke up as a coffee machine.
Today, my cat decided to bark.
She wore mismatched shoes to work.
My pet rock left a note.
The sandwich tried to eat me.
Socks have feelings on laundry day.
The talking banana argued with me.
An invisible man became a mime.
She found a room full of jokes.
The unicorn refused to share glitter.
He always loses his keys magically.
mystery: Silence greeted her on the phone.
A glowing symbol marked the tree.
She found a locket of herself.
A stranger gave him an envelope.
A map led them to nowhere.
He received emails from the void.
The bookstore hid a secret section.
A child's drawing showed the future.
random: An elephant wore a top hat.
The vending machine gave a gem.
He woke where dance was language.
A giant teacup stood in the forest.
She found a city inside the fridge.
Time froze except for a hummingbird.
A letter dated fifty years ahead arrived.
A door appeared on the mountain.
He found glasses that read thoughts.
The town held a Festival of Lost Things.
An old man erased regrets with a machine.
